conversation_message.subject: Account Access Issue
conversation_message.body: I've been unable to access my online banking account since yesterday. I've tried resetting my password, but no luck. Can you assist?

parts.body: Hi Michael, we're sorry to hear you're having trouble accessing your account. I've escalated this to our technical team and will get back to you within the next 24 hours with an update.

conversation_message.subject: Dispute Transaction
conversation_message.body: I noticed a charge on my account that I donâ€™t recognize from January 25th, 2024, for $150. Can you help me dispute this transaction?

parts.body: Hello Elizabeth, I understand your concern regarding the unrecognized charge. I'll start the dispute process for this transaction and aim to have an update for you by tomorrow.
